arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ الْعَنْ قَتَلَةَ الْحُسَيْنِ وَأَوْلاَدِهِ وَأَصْحَابِه
فَیَا لَیْتَنِیْ کُنْتُ مَعَکُمْ فَاَفُوْزَ مَعَکُمْ فَوْزًا عَظِیْمَا
translation: O Allah condemn and lay a curse upon the killers of Husayn (as], his family and friends, and say:
Would that we were with you So that we could also share the great accomplishment with you
transliteration: fayā laytanī kuntu ma`akum fa-afūza ma`akum fawzan `aẓīmā
